forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Thunderday Update

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in version 159.2 (you're on [version])! Thx everyone & enjoy!
There's a new "I'm invisible to camera" option on the back of the camera stream context dialog! You can use it for e.g. puppeteering. Thx Ferny!
We optimized particle systems shade handling! Pls let us know if you spot speed boosts (or visual differences) in comparison to yesterday's v159.1. Thx Sirdesh!
The "play" command's "with" auto-completion help wasn't working since recently, that's fixed now! Thx Lynk!
And Update v159.3: There's a new "Invisible to Cameras" setting in the Thing -> ... -> More options! It hides the thing on custom desktop camera streams. Thx Kool!
And Update 159.5: The "Personal Experience" setting is now also available in the Thing -> More settings (not just the Thing Part More settings)! Thx Gio!

thread.latestCommentText: And Update 159.5: The "Personal Experience" setting is now also available in the Thing -> More settings (not just the Thing Part More settings)! Thx Gio!
